etymologies: Old English bēo, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch bij and German dialect Beie

shortDefinitions: stinging winged insect which collects nectar and pollen

definitions: an insect of a large group to which the honeybee belongs, including many solitary as well as social kinds.

notes.text: Superfamily Apoidea, order Hymenoptera: several families, often now placed in the single family Apidae

shortDefinitions: insect of large group to which honeybee belongs, including many solitary as well as social kinds

definitions: a meeting for communal work or amusement
shortDefinitions: meeting for communal work or amusement

phrases.text: have a bee in one's bonnet
